games.name: The Onion
games.abstract: Onion game is a series a scenes with no real connection. For each scene that is played, we add layers to the metaphorical onion.

games.name: New Choice
games.abstract: New choice sees players through a regular scene, but one where the director at any time can ask the improvisers to change what they just did or said.

games.name: Sound Effects
games.abstract: A regular scene where the sound and/or dialogue are delegated to improvisers that are off-stage.
